content:
[ ] New ERCs: contract-driven transactions, P2P oracle processing (also useful on Peeper for decentralized Peepeth`s Twitter/GitHub verification)
[ ] DAO
[ ]  
[ ] Post any video (also from others) on blockchain to Dat/IPFS, receive a ownership claim token to be used on original video description
[ ]  
[ ] SharedSearch
[ ] Verify if video were posted before, and revoke ownership after dispute
[ ] Same video, available on multiple networks
[ ] Lives
[ ] Copyright
[ ] Aragon Ads
[ ] Support to television`s "Play" apps and personal apps
[ ] #NeTVisionVersions
[ ] Own vd: prof, vlg / other chnls
title: Z. NeTVision blockchain (r4 - Floflis P)
